import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { constructor(){} selectedMedicines: any[] = []; public quantity: number[] = Array(200).fill(1); public removeStatus: boolean[] = Array(200).fill(false) ngOnInit(): void { const cart = localStorage.getItem('cart') if(cart!==null){ this.selectedMedicines = JSON.parse(cart) } console.log(this.selectedMedicines) } remove(item:any,i:number){ this.selectedMedicines.splice(i, 1); this.removeStatus[i] = !this.removeStatus[i] } }
